# Fixture Sources

This directory contains a few fixtures adapted from external projects with permissive licenses.

- `realistic_pico.html`
  - Source inspiration: Pico CSS docs starter template
  - URL: https://picocss.com/docs/
  - License: MIT (`Code Licensed MIT` in site footer/license notes)

- `realistic_normalize.css`
  - Source inspiration: `normalize.css` v8.0.1
  - URL: https://github.com/necolas/normalize.css/blob/master/normalize.css
  - License: MIT

The files are adapted for parser/integration tests and include inline attribution headers.

- `complex_bootstrap_dashboard.html`
  - Source inspiration: twbs/examples starter + dashboard-like example markup
  - URL: https://github.com/twbs/examples
  - License: MIT

- `complex_openprops.css`
  - Source inspiration: modern-normalize + Open Props patterns
  - URLs:
    - https://github.com/sindresorhus/modern-normalize
    - https://github.com/argyleink/open-props
  - License: MIT

- `complex_vite_like_webapp.html`
  - Source inspiration: Vite vanilla template + Bootstrap starter patterns
  - URLs:
    - https://github.com/vitejs/vite/tree/main/packages/create-vite/template-vanilla
    - https://github.com/twbs/examples
  - License: MIT

- `complex_bootstrap_escape.css`
  - Source inspiration: Bootstrap form-select style + Tailwind escaped utility conventions
  - URLs:
    - https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/blob/main/dist/css/bootstrap.css
    - https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss
  - License: MIT

- `stress_html_duplicate_sections.html`
  - Source inspiration: Bootstrap list-group and dashboard-like markup patterns
  - URL: https://github.com/twbs/examples
  - License: MIT

- `stress_css_duplicate_media.css`
  - Source inspiration: Bootstrap utility/media-query style conventions
  - URL: https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap
  - License: MIT

- `minified_dashboard.html`
  - Source inspiration: HTML5 Boilerplate structural template (minified adaptation)
  - URL: https://github.com/h5bp/html5-boilerplate
  - License: MIT

- `minified_bundle.css`
  - Source inspiration: normalize.css + Bootstrap-like utility bundle patterns (minified adaptation)
  - URLs:
    - https://github.com/necolas/normalize.css
    - https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap
  - License: MIT
